Class DatabaseScaffolder

Provides reverse-engineering utilities that can scaffold entity classes and a DbContext from an existing database schema.

ScaffoldAsync(DbConnection, DatabaseProvider, string, string, string)

Generates entity classes and a DbContext based on the current database schema.

Declaration
